TextView.android:text: If an odds amount is positive (+) and should the bet win, the odds amount is how much you win for every $100 you wager. This means the bet is an underdog
Ex: Wagering $100 on a bet with odds +250 nets a $250 reward on top of retaining the original $100 wager
If an odds amount is negative (-) and should that bet win, the odds amount is how much you need to wager in order to win $100. This means the bet is favored
Ex: Wagering $175 on a bet with odds -175 nets a $100 reward on top of retaining the original $175 wager
